PRESS & MEDIA

Welcome to the press section of Riyadh Fashion Week 2025. Here you'll find press releases, media resources, and information for journalists and media professionals covering the event.

MEDIA RESOURCES

Press Kit

Download our comprehensive press kit containing high-resolution images, logos, and event information.

Apply for media accreditation to cover Riyadh Fashion Week 2025.

); }; export default Press;
